References

This list contains the key sources, articles, and websites that influenced the content and design of the Flat Design Archive.

  • Article

    Chung, J. (2014). **The History of Flat Design.** UX Planet. Discusses the evolution of flatness from Swiss Style to modern digital interfaces.

    Read Article
  • Book

    Gerstner, K. (1986). **Designing Programmes.** Focuses on the systematic application of grids and typography, highly influential to early Flat Design principles.

    View on Amazon
  • Web

    Apple Inc. (2013). **Introducing iOS 7.** The announcement that solidified the shift away from skeuomorphism in mainstream consumer technology.

    View Archive
  • Guide

    Microsoft Design Team. (2010). **Metro Design Language Guide.** The early document detailing the principles behind Windows Phone 7's "Metro" interface.

    Download PDF
